long_description: A proven classic, the MTI Cruiser SE PFD offers a clean design, comfortable fit and excellent flotation at a great value. Features traditional vertical foam panels with central panels that extend up and over the shoulders in 1 continuous piece, providing padding while you portage your boat. Dual strap adjustments create a snug fit on each side. Handy cargo pocket keeps essentials within reach; reflective tape increases your visibility. The MTI Cruiser SE PFD features a durable, 300-denier polyester shell for long-lasting service. Closeout.
short_description: A proven classic, the MTI Cruiser SE PFD offers a clean design, comfortable fit and excellent flotation at a great value.
